sentences: Yann Tiersen (born 23 June 1970) is a French musician and composer.

sentences: His delicate but deeply emotional style has been linked to Frédéric Chopin and the other great masters of Romantic music, and also to Erik Satie, the colourful figure of the early 20th century Parisian avant-garde whose work was a precursor to later artistic movements such as minimalism, repetitive music, and the Theatre of the Absurd.
section: == Music == | === Styles and instruments ===

sentences: Tiersen is also compared to one of the most influential composers of the late 20th century, the American minimalism, classical–contemporary classical, and ambient music composer Philip Glass, and to British minimalist music composer, pianist, librettist and musicologist Michael Nyman, known for the many film scores he wrote during his lengthy career and who is the reason for Tiersen to be often called the Gallic Michael Nyman.
section: == Music == | === Styles and instruments ===

sentences: In 1983, at the age of thirteen, he broke his violin and bought an electric guitar.
